mapper.insert: insert into t_books (book_number, book_name, book_author, book_type, book_description) values (#{bookNumber},#{bookName},#{bookAuthor},#{bookType},#{bookDescription})
mapper.update: update t_books set book_name = #{bookName}, book_author = #{bookAuthor}, book_type = #{bookType}, book_description = #{bookDescription} where book_id = #{bookNumber}
update t_order set order_status = 1 where order_number = #{orderNumber} and card_name = #{cardName}
update t_#{userId}_o set order_status = 1 where card_name = #{cardName} and order_number = #{orderNumber}
update t_books set book_type = null where book_type = #{bookType}
